ka rank bhi aay gaya.par mere papa k pass utna paisa nahi tha ki woh mujhe gvmnt clg mein bharti kr de.toh selected ho ne k baad v main ne woh chod diya.fir ghar se thoda kuch  paisa de ke mujhe gvmnt text:
OPEN AREA AND BREAK. 
I have a question on this that..
What if you are feeling lonely.  U r struggling with your career prblms. Relation and emotional abuse.  And u want to spend ur time with those who can understand ur feeling, issue.. you need break also.. you really want leave everything and just go somewhere for alone time.
 But in that time you don't want to stay alone.. u want to go on break but with some good company also...
U have a fear that you can't be alone time.. these you can't disconnect with social life... 

And this not only my prblm.. i m from mumbai. And it's happening with every one.. 
Every want to go out n want to njy the nature.  But they can't bcz they are in fear of loneliness.. people are these days are not struggling only bcz of career.. they struggling with lack of social life. Lack of emotional attachments or they are too much attached emotionally with someone.. some of are jst waiting or expecting that my what's notification is only abt her/him, friends , friend, or boyfriend...
N its a serious prblm.  Bcz people these days dont know how to react. How to handle. They are start choosing temporary happiness in drugs, liquor and temporary relationship with anyone.  They are more dependable with other.. and this scenario is not only with those who are not earning. It's happening with every one. 
If public is dependent on others how they can choose that they want to go some random place to find there peace...Ôªø

text:
Giving is living 
Please read this to help someone in need 

My brother Shantesh Ojha is an MNNIT 2012 batch passout from mechanical engineering department. He's 30 years old and got married 2 years ago. He started getting high fever from 3rd jan 2018 to 6 jan 2018 and his blood reports showed high levels of liver and kidney enzymes and on 8th jan doctors told us that he needed dialysis urgently as his kidneys had failed. We were at varanasi at that time and his condition was deteriorating rapidly so on doctors recommendation we flew him to Delhi and admitted him in Sir Ganga Ram hospital Delhi. There he was diagnosed with Acute viral Hepatitis E which resulted in his acute liver failure and acute kidney failure and they told us that it will recover by self recovery as there is no medicine for Hepatitis E but only support to the body so that it can recover by itself. There he underwent dialysis every alternate day and due to coagulopathy all in all 35 units of fresh frozen plasma and blood was transfused to him till 7th march. After that he was transferred to institute for liver and billiary sciences vasant kunj delhi for second opinion on his liver condition as even after close to 2 months time his both organs were unable to recover and his liver condition was deteriorating. Initially it had shown some recovery and major portion it was stable but it started deteriorating after 2nd march. We admitted him to ILBS on 7th march. There on 8 th march after conducting tests they told us that liver cannot recover and kidney has been lost too and he needs liver and kidney transplant as soon as possible. We inquired about best treatment for this and we consulted at other hospitals as well like max and medanta and we came to that this type of surgery has best success rate at Medanta Hospital Gurgaon. Before shifting him here we have already incurred a cost of Rs 20-22 lakhs already. And the cost for this dual transplant surgery is estimated at 35-40 lacs. This is the only option to save life of a young man filled with aspirations and dreams of future. So I request you all to please contribute whatever you can because drops make a whole ocean.üôèüèªüôè

author: Ramesh rao

text:
Sandeep Sir, kindly give some good time on understanding Narcissism and please deliver an insightful session on this problem w.r.t. an narcissist father, if you find it relevant & feasible. 

I have been facing and dealing with a narcissist father for the last 25.5 years and I don't know how to make him realize that it's not gonna work if he continues to abuse & control us emotionally. My younger brother has also started developing the same self-centered approach towards people(including his own mother) and I'm afraid that his blind faith in his "innocent & clean-hearted" dad will land him up in the worst conundrum some years down the line.

My research on narcissism has convinced me to put an end to our(Dad & Mine) purely benefit-oriented relationship with my father and brother(perhaps) but my mother is the most sensitive victim cum believer of my father's sweet excuses and justification therefore I fail to implement this decision and she ends up getting abused and manipulated in an even more sweeter way and remains hooked up as he leaves no scope of doubt in his private sessions of justifying himself and winning the trust of my mother & brother again which is something that eventually maintain his fabricated public image, the only thing he is concerned.

And I can assure you of the fact that this is not just me who is struggling with such non-empathetic and cruel behaviour which doesn't lets an individual to develop a sense of self-esteem and confidence of one's own real self and always seeks for approval of others because he never got validation or encouragement of how he dealt and saw the world instead was always forced to follow, agree and comply with his father's way of thinking without allowing you a moment of resistance or permission to differ with his opinion, else you get declared as a "dead investment" which becomes words of wisdom for the rest of the blind members of the family as the narcissist father ensures that he is least likely to be accused of being the real reason behind any setbacks in social life or differences between his victim and his blind followers as they are made to learn that problem lies in the abused victim and not the monster himself.

Kindly give a serious thought to it. And let us know what should one practice to deal with a narcissist. Is it emotional intelligence that we should start working on or should we just leave everything and start finding the real self within OR keep on surviving with 12-hour self killing job and constantly accommodating with what people expect out of you thereafter suppressing the extended narcissistic personality within you which always gets you rejected if expressed by even 5% of it ?

In case of any quick clarifications regarding narcissism, kindly search Google Images about Narcissism Personality Disorder - https://www.google.co.in/search?q=narcissistic+personality+disorder&source=lnms&tbm=isch&sa=X&ved=0ahUKEwjj_Zfg4PbYAhVGp48KHRpJCiEQ_AUICigB&biw=1536&bih=694&dpr=1.25Ôªø

text:
Kya jindagi ho gayi hai,ham khush hai ya nahi wo ham lamhe par mahsus karate hai.ham khush hai ye khud ko sabit karane ke liye kuch naya sa karate hai.khudako muskurate huye photo me kaid karate hai aur khudako yakin dilate hai.jab usa par jyada like aur views agaye to khudako tassali dilate hai.aur khush rahane ke liye khudahi bahane dhundkar khudako khush mahsus karte hai.
Kyun karate hai ye sab .......
Bas ham khush hai is ke liye kuch aur karane ki kya jaroorat hai.kyun hamare khushiyonke mayane badal gaye hai.kyun kuch bhi karane ki aur kisi ko bhi ham khush hai ye prove karane ki jarurat hai ham actual me khush hone ke bad.ham khudake liye khushi dhundate hai ?ya auronke liye?to phir khudake liye khudako khush rakho ham khush hai jo chahiye wo paliya hai ya pana hai bas khush hai thodasa jiliya aur thodasa jina hai.
Ham jo hai usame khush hai aur jo bhi chahiye wo milgaya to bhi ham khush hi rahenge.to phir bas accept karo ke aap khush ho aur ab tum jo bhi karoge sahi ke liye karoge soch kar relax karo kyunki badlav aap ke liye sirf aap hi la sakate ho.
Kya jarurat hai khush hai isliye kuch bhi dikhava karane ki.
Khush hai kisiko bhi samjhane ki.
Kuch karana hi chahiye aisi koi bat nahi.
Khushi andara se honi chahiye 
Jo ankhonse chhalakni chahiye aur jo juban se nahi dil se bayan honi chahiye.Ôªø

author: Kunal jha

text:
Happiness ke liye jab tak ham jiyenge ham life ko ji nahi payenge,kyunki life hamare soch aur samaj se bhahut badi hai agar hame khud par aur bhagvan par bharosa hai to jitana ham manga ke nahi pa sakate usse jyada milega......ek hi chees karana hai bas happiness ke liye nahi balki satisfaction ke liye jina kyunki mujhe lagata hai happiness is selfish but satisfaction is selfishness.
Kyunki bahot bar aisi situations ajati hai janha hame hamari khushi aur hamari karibiyonki khushi me se ek ko chunana padata hai aur ham hamari chun lete hai par jaisi ki pain aur pleasure dono hi temporary hai to ham thodese time ke liye khush hote to jarur hai par satisfied nahi hote kyunki ek selfish bane wo guilt hame satane lagata hai.is liye hame life me khudake happiness ke beyond jake  ham jab sahi waqt par chote chote sahi decision lete hai fair banakar tab hame internally happiness milati hai jab ham sahi soch kar sahi kuch bhi karate hai na to dusare log kya samajhenge kya kahenge isse kuch fark nahi padata kyunki us samay lgata hai maine wohi kiya jitana sahi aur best mai kar sakata tha.aur us samay tumko pata hota hai jo bhi decision maine liya usse mujhe chahe pain mile ya pleasure kya farq padata hai maine jo kiya wo sahi tha.ye sochkar aap andar se satisfied feel karate ho aur agar dard mila bhi to haskar sahalete ho kyunki at that moment aap khush to nahi par sahi jaroor hote ho.to dosto apako happiness nahi bhi milegi phir bhi sukoon rahega.aap satisfied rahoge aur Jindagi me sukh,dukh chalata rahega par jindagi ko khudake liye sachhai se jina aur sukh ke liye nahi balki sahi ke liye jina jyada jaruri hai.to dosto aap hi batao aap selfless happiness ke liye jina chahate ho ya sirf temporary happiness ke liye?
Responsible banana aur responsibility ke liye jina.
 khudake sath auronke liye bhi jina jindagi hai.bas khudako bada banana hai to apane karibiyonke age jo apako matter karate hai unse khudako, apane ego ko thodasa jhukalo.aur dekho unko jitane dene me aur unse argument me harane me bhi ek alaga si khushi milegi.bas dosto jab aap sahi honge apake tarikese to bhagavan apake sath rahenge to kya dar har bat khushi se beyond hogi.
Kya sochana aur kyun sochana jindagi wahi sikayegi jo wo chahati ho.so you are already happy just accept it.Ôªø

author: Arvind Dongare

text:
with great respect to sandeep sir...what you said about following your passion is absolutely right but most of the time its impractical. The fresh college out kid needs a healthy earning job to enjoy his independence, to enjoy spending his own earnings, apne paise se bike lena...and all these..then love happens..then marriage,,then kids..these things will happen in your life whether u r an engineer or painter 
unless you make a cocktail of passion and work..work and passion...its little punishment waiting..
its only when you have worked enough to choose an gutsy option , then only it is actually possible to follow your passion completely...otherwise, it will only be a small 3-6-9 affair.
I have written on this subject deeply in my book" Being at your own feet" . can send a free soft copy...lemmi know if intrested.Ôªø

author: Swati Singh

text: Good afternoon sir, sir even after watching your this vedio i m still confused ki mujhe kya krna chahiye. I m in 10 standard and at this point of time i have to decide ki age mujhe kya krna h. I want to be a cricketer and i feel that i can do something and achieve something in this career but sometimes i feel like it's not a good choice and i should do something else like docter, engineer, etc. So i want you to help mee that how can i come out of this problem?? Plss help sir!!Ôªø
author: Aniket Gupta

text: Aniket Gupta you should follow what ur heart saysÔªø
author: ZAISHA _______.

text: Thanks for your suggestion di but i also wanna share with you that what i sometimes feel is what i am doing is wrong and even my parents do not want me to choose sports as my career. Thus i get confused ki mujhe kya krna chahiye and i should think of it as soon as possible. What i need is just a confirmation or feel comfortable on my decisionÔªø
author: Aniket Gupta

text:
Aniket Gupta try to get a clear picture of what you really like doing. For example, I like creating illustrations. Once you are clear with that, research on the net about various careers related to that thing which you like. Believe me you'll find number of good careers in the field. Then find appropriate courses for it. And before jumping into the course try to brush up your skills by watching tutorials on YouTube or any other resource and  do it practically. By doing this you'll feel more confident about your abilities and you'll get more determined on getting what you want. 
While coming back to your studies, choosing a stream for 11th would be secondary! Just choose a stream which has maximum subjects of your interest. For example, if you like stats and economics choose commerce, if you like science choose science, don't think about what you want to become from now. Because there are really number of ways to earn money. Even i was confused when i chose engineering, it was only in my second year when i was exposed to careers in digital artistry , that i chose to be one! And i love doing it irrespective of  the money i earn( but just for your information this field does have quite a lot of money ;) but takes a lot of efforts too)!Ôªø
author: samarth srivastav

text: Aniket Gupta if you want to be a cricketer try to know your skill set better first. Try to see how good you are in cricket as of now, amd try to brush it up by practicing daily , keeping in mind that you take out time for studies as well. It's all about time management. And once you are clear with your motive then with a serious look on the face, just tell your parents what you want to do! Make them understand your passion!(that is only if you really are that passionate about it;) )Ôªø
author: samarth srivastav

text: Thank you so much for your suggestions and advise i appreciate it and will definitely think upon it but i would also like to share that there were many instances in my life where i got the opportunity to show that even i can achieve something, can do something in my life if i take sports as my career but i never got a chance to highlight myself. Moreover, if i talk about time management, that along with sports i should give my time to studies, then i think i must give time to any one of the two choices( either to cricket or to my studies) so that i can perfect myself in that perticular choice. So what do u say? What i should i do thn?Ôªø
